title: Peking Duck Broth With Nappa Cabbage
summary: Peking Duck Broth With Nappa Cabbage might be just the main course you are searching for. Watching your figure? This caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal recipe has 1813 calories, 56g of protein, and 154g of fat per serving. This recipe serves 5. For $6.39 per serving, this recipe covers 59% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Only a few people made this recipe, and 2 would say it hit the spot. This recipe is typical of Chinese cuisine. Head to the store and pick up nappa cabbage, chicken broth, chubby section ginger, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the salt you could follow this main course with the Apple Turnovers Recipe as a dessert. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 1 hour and 6 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 93%. This score is amazing. Try Miso Soup With Crispy Age Tofu, Nappa Cabbage And Green Onions, Peking Duck, and Peking Duck for similar recipes.
